entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
